backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing trade analysis backend with user profiles, trade calculations (position size, risk/reward ratio), trade history storage per user, and role-based access control using MixinAuthorization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting implemented features for Yahoo Finance integration error handling, including comprehensive error logging, URL validation, CORS/network error detection, and UI error message display.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend TypeScript/React files covering authentication, trade analysis, market data fetching with error handling, CSV upload, technical indicators, and UI components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color system defining light and dark theme variables optimized for financial data visualization with trading-themed aesthetics.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Trade Setup Analyzer React application with root div and module script reference.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component orchestrating authentication, user profile setup, trade analysis form with market data auto-population, CSV upload integration, history panel, and comprehensive error display with diagnostic mode.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Authentication button component that handles Internet Identity login/logout, managing authentication state and clearing query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal dialog for new users to set up their profile by entering their name, with validation and error handling for profile creation.
frontend/src/components/CsvUploadPanel.t: React component for uploading CSV price data files, parsing OHLCV format, computing technical indicators, and triggering callbacks with PricePoint-formatted data for trade input auto-population.
Collapsible diagnostic panel component that displays market data request details, cache state, retry history, and environment information for debugging purposes.
frontend/src/components/DisclaimerGate.t: Modal dialog component that displays a legal disclaimer about educational use and trading risks, requiring user acknowledgment via checkbox before accessing the application.
frontend/src/components/history/HistoryD: Detailed view component for a single trade analysis, displaying input parameters, calculated results, and potential profit/loss metrics with navigation back to history list.
frontend/src/components/history/HistoryP: Panel component that displays a list of saved trade analyses with loading states, error handling, and navigation to detailed views of individual trades.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance, handling both authenticated and anonymous actors, and invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useMarketData.ts: React hook for managing market data fetch state with retry logic, cooldown timers, rate limit handling, and diagnostic support for debugging.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating queries are organized in feature-specific hooks elsewhere.
frontend/src/hooks/useTradeAnalysis.ts: React Query mutation hook for analyzing trades via the backend actor, accepting trade parameters and invalidating trade history on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useTradeHistory.ts: React Query hooks for fetching trade history list and individual trades by ID from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and saving the current user's profile via the backend actor with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark theme colors, including chart colors and design tokens.
frontend/src/lib/csv/parsePriceCsv.ts: CSV parser for price data files, extracting date, OHLC, and volume columns with validation and error reporting.
frontend/src/lib/indicators.ts: Technical indicator calculations including SMA, support, and resistance levels from price data or market data price points.
frontend/src/lib/marketData/config.ts: Configuration constants for Yahoo Finance API including base URL, rate limits, and usage notes.
frontend/src/lib/marketData/deriveTradeI: Derives default trade entry, stop loss, and take profit values from market data and technical indicators using conservative defaults.
frontend/src/lib/marketData/fetchMarketD: Fetches intraday price data from Yahoo Finance API with comprehensive error handling, timeout control, environment detection, and verbose debug logging.
frontend/src/lib/marketData/marketDataCl: Client-side market data wrapper implementing caching (60s TTL), request de-duplication, rate-limit spacing (2s minimum interval), and automatic retry with exponential backoff for failed requests. Includes diagnostic tracking for cache hits/misses and request/response details.
frontend/src/lib/marketData/marketDataPo: Centralized policy constants for market data fetching: 60s cache TTL, 2s minimum request interval, 3 max retries with 5-30s exponential backoff. Provides ticker normalization and backoff delay calculation utilities.
frontend/src/lib/marketData/types.ts: TypeScript type definitions for market data: MarketDataResult (price points, ticker, timestamp, provider), MarketDataError (error codes including rate_limit, invalid_ticker, network_error, etc.), and PricePoint (OHLCV data).
frontend/src/lib/session.ts: Session storage utilities for tracking disclaimer acknowledgment state using sessionStorage with 'trade_analyzer_disclaimer_acknowledged' key.
frontend/src/lib/tradeMath.ts: Trade calculation utilities: computes potential profit/loss from entry/exit prices and position size, and provides currency/percentage formatting functions.
frontend/src/lib/urlParams.ts: Simple URL query parameter utilities for reading and checking URL parameters from window.location.search.
frontend/src/lib/validation.ts: Input validation utilities for required fields and numeric inputs with optional positive-value enforcement, returning error messages or null.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React application entry point that sets up QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Comprehensive URL parameter utilities supporting both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence for parameters like admin tokens and functions to clear sensitive parameters from URLs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom theme extending colors (using OKLCH color space), typography, container queries, animations (accordion), and custom font families (Inter, JetBrains Mono).
project_state.json: Project state document describing a stock analysis web app that should fetch live market data by ticker, with known issues around rate limiting, retry logic, and Yahoo Finance provider failures. Includes architectural notes on rate-limit mitigation and existing features for trade analysis, CSV upload, and user history.
